title: Augmented Reality-Based Interior Design Master Class

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of interior design and foundational understanding of drafting
context.additional_context: Establishing a real-time collaborative and project-based assessment environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners enhance spatial composition skills by placing 3D furniture models using the MAR (Mixed Reality) application
Learners can accurately identify over 10 interior design symbols and apply them to real-world spaces
Learners evaluate spatial planning decision-making abilities by real-time comparative analysis of various design layouts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
